name: Carlos García

top_projects.name: todo-vimst
top_projects.description: 🚀 Supercharge Your Neovim Workflow! Turn TODOs into Todoist Tasks with a few Keystrokes.

top_projects.name: Journey-to-Orion
top_projects.description: Journey to Orion is a Space Exploration Simulator that puts you in the cockpit of a small spaceship in a big galaxy! Explore a vast 3D system with procedurally generated planets, ships, and asteroids, and attempt to reach different planets while keeping yourself safe from obstacles and avoiding collisions with tiny and not-so-tiny balls of rock.

top_projects.name: xenophobic-tweet-detection
top_projects.description: Using the default nltk bagging method called CountVectorizer and a regression classifier called ExtraTreesRegressor the program should be able to generate an accurate model to discern between the xenophobic and non-xenophobic tweets.

profile_summary: I'm Carlos García, an accomplished Analytics Engineer at Nubank with a strong background in Python, JavaScript, and Lua programming languages. With a proven track record of delivering data-driven insights and solutions, I excel at leveraging my technical expertise to drive business growth and improvement through data analysis and visualization. As a committed open-source contributor to over a dozen repositories, I'm passionate about collaborating with like-minded developers and continuously expanding my skillset to stay at the forefront of industry trends.
